results.content: ## Abridge Headquarters - Office Location & Address ## Abridge Headquarters Abridge is a leading AI company headquartered in Pittsburgh, PA. ## Headquarters Location The Abridge headquarters is strategically located in Pittsburgh, providing access to top talent, industry partners, and a thriving business ecosystem. Located at 2000 Technology Dr, Pittsburgh, PA 15219, the headquarters is easily accessible via multiple transportation options including public transit, parking facilities, and bike storage. As Abridge continues to expand its market presence, the Pittsburgh headquarters remains the foundation of global operations, designed to accommodate future growth and evolving needs. ### Ibeo Automotive Headquarters - Office Location & Address ### Hesai Technology Headquarters - Office Location & Address ### RoboSense Headquarters - Office Location & Address

results.content: ## Abridge Inc - About the company Abridge Inc is a series E company based in Pittsburgh (United States), founded in 2018byZachary Zack Lipton, Florian Metze, Shivdev Rao and Sandeep Konam. Abridge Inc has raised $773M in funding from investors like Lightspeed Venture Partners, Redpoint Ventures and Andreessen Horowitz, with a current valuation of $5.3B. | 1st | Abridge Inc 2018, Pittsburgh (United States), Series E | Provider of AI-based health record platform | $773M | IVP, CapitalG & 30 others | 70/100 | Abridge Inc is a funded company, having raised a total of $773M across 6 funding rounds to date. Abridge Inc's latest funding was a $316M Series E round on Jun 12, 2025, led byAndreessen Horowitz.
